name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: BrowserCopilot - Your AI Copilot Across the Web

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An AI Browser Companion that understands website content, to help you automate and complete tasks faster.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
BrowserCopilot.ai - Your AI Companion Across the Web

✅ Say farewell to multiple tabs! BrowserCopilot understands the context of any webpage, integrates seamlessly, and offers tailored AI answers.

✅ Capture a screenshot, and let the AI guide you.

✅ Create custom prompts for content transformation directly from highlighted text.
